thread.section_title: The Trafalgar Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic views, great location, comfortable property
thread.title_full: Fantastic views, great location, comfortable property - Review of The Trafalgar Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Scott J
title: Fantastic views, great location, comfortable property
text: My wife and I had stayed here for an anniversary trip and chose the Trafalgar Square location for the first time. We were very happy with the location, staff, and rooms available. They even had construction being performed at the time, but it was not disruptive and the staff was very supportive to ensure we had a nice stay. For the location alone, the place would be recommended - the staff and rooms are icing on top!
